TestDescription.name: PHP errors enabled
TestDescription.Description: The display_errors directive determines whether error messages should be sent to the browser. These messages frequently contain sensitive information about your web application environment, and should never be presented to untrusted sources. [break][break]display_errors is on by default.
TestDescription.Recommendation: You can disable display_errors from php.ini or .htaccess.[break][break][bold]php.ini[/bold][break]display_errors = 'off'[break]log_errors = 'on'[break][break][bold].htaccess[/bold][break]php_flag display_errors off[break]php_flag log_errors on
